name: Below The Tide
description:
A game-experience about an explorer vessel in a bottomless ocean. The purpose is to go down as far as you can.

Objectives:

- Any action takes energy.

- Land on the platforms to charge up.

- Avoid running out off the charge.

Controls (Thrusting):

- Arrow Keys

Pro tip: Combine keys for acceleration

LD Jam page:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/below-the-tide
